Description: Becoming a tool that delivers the fastest and most accurate insights in an era of information overload.
Utilizes Google Custom Search API to explore relevant news.
Reflects news from the last 24 hours in search results by default.
Explores global reports in real-time by searching with English keywords.
Excludes fake news or unverified rumor sites from search results.
Excludes documents that are more than 80% similar to the current report.
Integrates and summarizes news from multiple outlets covering the same event.
Supports reports in DOCX and PPTX formats in addition to PDF.
Selects news based on keywords of interest set by the user.
Generates a visual mind map image of the report structure.
Automatically generates scripts for Shorts/Reels based on news summaries.
Sends Slack notifications when important news regarding designated keywords occurs.
Summarizes international news in Korean after translation.
Briefs the summary content via audio using Google TTS.
Answers questions like 'How does this news affect Samsung Electronics?'.
Creates quizzes to verify the understanding of the summarized content.
Explicitly states 'Under verification' if there is conflicting information.
Provides APIs for other services to use our summarization features.
Uses OCR technology to extract text from image-based reports.
Indexes every sentence in the summary to its source in the original text.
Aims for completion of summarization within an average of 5 seconds after upload.
Utilizes the latest LLMs to enhance context comprehension capabilities.
Calculates contextual similarity between news to create relevant clusters.
Splits long reports into semantic units to summarize without omissions.
Limits the maximum summary length per news item to 500 characters.
Strictly verifies to ensure no invention of figures or facts not in the original text.
Removes unnecessary modifiers and uses concise, bulleted sentences.
Summarizes information based on KMA and global weather APIs.
Separately highlights and summarizes exclusive or breaking stories by outlet.
Includes a one-sentence summary of public opinion from major communities/comments.
Automatically classifies news into 8 categories (Economy, Tech, International, etc.).
Summarizes the meaning of major photos or infographics included in the news.
Summarizes scores and key highlights immediately after the game ends.
Breaking news updated in real-time; general news updated every hour.
Does not expose news under embargo until the official release time.
Analyzes changes by comparing with summaries of past news on the same issue.
Real-time translation and summary of major outlets like BBC, CNN, and Al Jazeera.
Summarizes based on core facts (5W1H) with a neutral stance.
Extracts only the key points of the main interviewee's statements.
Prioritizes Google News and verified news agencies like AP and Reuters.
Automatically filters out modifiers biased toward specific parties or ideologies.
Summarizes the top 10 news stories of the week every Sunday evening.
Reports summaries of major indices and causes of fluctuations after market close.
Prioritizes local news based on the user's location information.
Modifies sensationalist 'clickbait' titles from the original text into neutral ones.
Places a '3-line core summary' at the very top of the report summary.
Principle of quoting charts and figures from the report exactly as they appear.
Mandatory display of target price changes when summarizing stock reports.
Clearly states the actual publication date of the original report at the beginning.
Compares and summarizes conflicting views from various institutions on the same topic.
Manages semi-annual industry outlook reports in a separate special section.
Notifies of possible errors if total figures in the text do not match.
Summarizes brokerage reports, government publications, and market analysis PDFs.
Provides a 1-minute (simple) and a 5-minute (detailed) version.
Provides links to basic knowledge dictionaries required before reading the report.
Attaches separate explanations for difficult economic or technical terms at the bottom.
Summarizes core changes in newly announced bills or policies.
Prioritizes reports from major institutions like Goldman Sachs and JP Morgan.
Always attaches an investment responsibility notice at the bottom of related reports.
Data from internal report summaries are not used for AI training.
All transmitted PDF files undergo SSL encryption.
Logs all report analysis requests for security purposes.
Delivers market atmosphere by analyzing positive/negative sentiment scores of news.
Recommends news most deeply related to the current summary being read.
Indicates the impact of specific news on related industries as High/Mid/Low.
Summarizes relationships between figures in the news in a graph format.
Displays real-time stock charts next to the report summary screen.
Shows current trending keywords in connection with Google Trends data.
Rates news based on social media mention volume.
Automatically generates a newsletter summarizing major issues every morning at 8 AM.
Supports a dark mode viewer to optimize the news reading environment.
News servers operate 24 hours a day without interruption.
Past summary data is stored for a maximum of 1 year before disposal.
Professional report summaries are provided only to premium members.
Please use Google Forms to report summary errors or functional inquiries.
The service complies with fair use guidelines; posting full texts is prohibited.
Review summarization logic upon receiving feedback about low quality.
Saves a list of news summaries recently read by the user.
Summaries are immediately updated if corrections occur in the original article.
Connects users to relevant experts for further questions on report content.
